DOC.brief_summary: This study is pilot study to evaluate safety and efficacy of lansoprazole in preterm infants with gastroesophageal reflux documented by 24hr pH impedance monitoring
DOC.brief_title: Lansoprazole in Preterm Infants With Reflux
DOC.criteria: preterm infant documented gastrointestinal reflux by 24hr pH monitoring unstable vital sings congenital anomaly in upper gastrointestinal tract incuding esophagus drug history of H2 blocker during last 1 week medication of warfarin, carbamazepine, phenytoin, rifampin renal or hepatic dysfunction inappropriate clinical conditions judged by researchers
